attributes.action: keep being able to celebrate Easter, Halloween, Christmas and any other celebration to do with christian
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Easter, Halloween, Christmas and any other celebration to do with Christian should not be banned and to be able to celebrate how we feel is fit.

This is Christian country and we should be able to celebrate these with all the decorations without anyone putting a ban to it.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "keep being able to celebrate Easter, Halloween, Christmas and any other celebration to do with christian."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14344.asp

Prime Minister's Office
